description: The Grafana dashboard of GreptimeDB cluster.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, le, path, method, code) (rate(greptime_servers_http_requests_elapsed_bucket{pod=~"$frontend",path!~"/health|/metrics"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, le, path, code) (rate(greptime_servers_grpc_requests_elapsed_bucket{pod=~"$frontend"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, le, scheme) (rate(opendal_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{pod=~"$datanode", operation="write"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, le, scheme) (rate(opendal_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{pod=~"$datanode", operation="list"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, le, scheme, operation) (rate(opendal_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{pod=~"$datanode", operation!~"read|write|list"}[$__rate_interval])))

title: GreptimeDB Cluster Metrics
